title: 3.0 Earthquake Strikes Union City
content:
UNION CITY — The U.S. Geological Survey reported a magnitude 3.0 earthquake Saturday morning less than a mile northeast of Union City.
The earthquake was reported at 10:22 a.m.
(Copyright 2014, Bay City News, All rights reserved.)
